text: == Offseason == * October 15, 1964: Bill Heath and a player to be named later were traded by the Phillies to the Chicago White Sox for Rudy May. The Phillies completed the deal by sending Joel Gibson (minors) to the White Sox on November 23.Rudy May at Baseball Reference * December 1, 1964: Danny Cater and Lee Elia were traded by the Phillies to the Chicago White Sox for Ray Herbert and Jeoff Long.Danny Catert at Baseball Reference * December 3, 1964: Rudy May and Costen Shockley were traded by the Phillies to the California Angels for Bo Belinsky.Bo Belinsky at Baseball Reference * December 22, 1964: Bobby Del Greco was purchased by the Phillies from the Milwaukee Braves.Bobby Del Greco at Baseball Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Notable transactions === * June 14, 1965: Gus Triandos was purchased from the Phillies by the Houston Astros.Gus Triandos at Baseball Reference * July 10, 1965: Frank Thomas was purchased from the Phillies by the Houston Astros.Frank Thomas at Baseball Reference * July 12, 1965: Denny Doyle was signed as an amateur free agent by the
